title: 1905 Parker Lane #A, Austin, TX 78741
posting_body: FOR LEASE - 1905 PARKER LANE, #A, AUSTIN, TX 78741 - $2,700/MONTH
Amazing central Austin location near downtown!
Perfect for roommates or business professionals who can work from home using the bonus room as an office space.
The main bedroom has a walk-in closet and bathroom, but both bedrooms are approximately the same size making it ideal for roommates.
Updated lighting, fixtures, and freshly painted throughout, with new carpet, granite countertops, and tile floors.
Large storage room outside of the unit.
Washer/dryer connections.
Large, fenced-in private backyard.
Large parking area in front and covered parking in back.
The duplex is within walking distance to shopping, entertainment, Lady Bird Lake and restaurants along Riverside and Oltorf.
It is a uniquely spacious duplex in a residential neighborhood with easy access to IH-35, HWY 71, and the airport.
Wonderful community to walk/ride bikes in the mornings or evenings.
-New carpet, paint, and fixtures
-Parking infront, and covered parking in back
-Gated backyard
-Great storage closet
-2 bedroom
-1 full bath, 1 half bath
-Bonus room that can be used as an extra bedroom or office
$2,000 security deposit
